/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the buildings.
